short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace new tab screen with Poporu Tab - Date & Time, Weather, Bookmark, and Domain Lookup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes default is just not enough. Change your default new tab experience with Poporu - a Chrome extension that tells you current date, time, weather, your recent browsing history and bookmarks.

Poporu is to make you perform less actions to open page that you often visit. It is updated regularly to enhance your browsing experience.
